articles.title: Unlocking Lending With Credora’s Privacy Preserving Credit Scoring
articles.description: Credora has raised $6 million of new finance as demand for private credit continues to grow
articles.content:
Darshan Vaidya, CEO of Credora
credora
How do would-be borrowers share sensitive data with potential lenders so they can secure the credit they need for business growth? US based Credora, which is … [+4609 chars]
articles.summary:
1. Credora is a fintech firm that offers privacy-preserving credit scoring by using data encryption.
2. By utilizing encrypted data, Credora provides unique insights into the creditworthiness of individuals without putting their personal data at risk.
3. The fintech firm is poised to revolutionize the lending industry by making it more transparent and personalized.

articles.title: How Leaders Can Cut Supply Chain Costs And Improve Performance
articles.description: Leaders that recognize the importance of data in decision making minimize risk and increases the likelihood of business success.
articles.content:
getty
Efficient supply chain management is a crucial element of business success, impacting everything from customer satisfaction to profitability. With the global supply chain becoming increasingly… [+7367 chars]
articles.summary:
1. Organisations can improve their supply chain performance and reduce associated costs by streamlining their supply chain networks. 

2. They should also retain a dynamic communication pathway, invest in modern tech, and filter their data to pinpoint problems and resolutions. 

3. Finally, leaders should aim to better manage their relationships with partners, vendors and their workforce.

articles.title: Can AI Help To Alleviate Supply Chain Pains?
articles.description: Retailers are dealing with overwhelming amounts of unusable overstock. AI-powered tools provide data insight to enable retailers to maintain an optimal balance of inventory, analyze consumer trends, and make real-time decisions.
articles.content:
By Inna Kuznetsova
C200 member Inna Kuznetsova is the CEO of ToolsGroup, whose AI-powered solutions enable companies to navigate supply chain uncertainty. Inna previously served as CEO of 1010data a… [+5916 chars]
articles.summary:
1. AI can help alleviate supply chain challenges, such as the impact of the pandemic and the increasing demand for e-commerce.
2. AI-powered technologies can improve inventory management, increase efficiency, and reduce costs.
3. Companies must invest in and integrate AI into their supply chain processes to stay competitive and meet customer demands.
